name: devapt-app-devtools
description: Developpers Application Toolkit - Developper Tools application

scripts.start:src: node --version && node node_modules/devapt/src/server/start_node.js -n NodeA -t src/resources/world -b node_modules/devapt-devtools/src -s NodeA:NodeALocal8080
scripts.debug: node debug node_modules/devapt/dist/server/start_node.js -n NodeA -t dist/resources/world -b node_modules/devapt-devtools/dist -s NodeA:NodeALocal8080
scripts.debug:babel: node debug node_modules/devapt/src/server/start_node.babel.js -n NodeA -t dist/resources/world -b node_modules/devapt-devtools/dist -s NodeA:NodeALocal8080
scripts.commit: unix2dos package.json && git status && pause && git commit -am
scripts.patch: npm version patch && unix2dos package.json && git status && pause && git commit -am
scripts.minor: npm version minor && unix2dos package.json && git status && pause && git commit -am
scripts.major: npm version major && unix2dos package.json && git status && pause && git commit -am
scripts.merge: git checkout master && git merge develop && git push app-devtools master && git checkout develop
scripts.release: git push app-devtools develop && git checkout master && git merge develop && git push app-devtools master && git checkout develop
